title: BYTE_To_STRH
description: This function converts a BYTE input variable into its corresponding hexadecimal string representation of two characters. The output is a string where each character represents a single digit of the hexadecimal value derived from the input BYTE.
name: BYTE_TO_STRH

input.name: IN
input.description: The BYTE input variable to be converted into a hexadecimal string.

return_value.description: The resulting string representation of the input BYTE in hexadecimal format.
